oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Rhea
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A portrait of John Rhea wearing a jacket with multiple collars and buttons as well as a white shirt with a collar. He is looking towards the viewer.
U.S. Representative from Tennessee, Rhea was born Ireland and practiced law. A War Hawk in Congress, Rhea urged the declaration of war against Great Britain in 1812.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harrison, William, 1774-
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rhea, John, 1753-1832
